puzzle.help: 1. The board contains one Sapphire (Blue Gem) on each row and column. 2. There are also a random amount of Pebbles (in White) on the board. 3. A number on the border tells you how many stones you can see from there, up to and including the Sapphire. 4. The Sapphire (blue) hide the Pebbles (white) behind them.
